summary: Resolved conflicts in DrinkCatalog.test.tsx (2 regex patterns), useCarCatalog.ts (implementation merge), and useCarCatalog.test.ts (fixtures and test cases)
strategyUsed: Used origin/main as primary for all three files: (1) DrinkCatalog.test.tsx — chose origin/main's lenient /starbucks/i and /costa/i regex patterns, which correctly match the component's aria-label values ('Starbucks drinks', 'Costa Coffee drinks') unlike HEAD's exact-match patterns; (2) useCarCatalog.ts — used origin/main's superior implementation (ref-based debounce, initialFilters support, ferrariCars/lamboCars naming consistent with CatalogPage.tsx) and merged in HEAD's availableDecades computed property; (3) useCarCatalog.test.ts — used origin/main's fixture data, fake-timer setup, and comprehensive debounce test suite, while adding HEAD's availableDecades test updated to expect [1970, 1980] to match origin/main's fixture decades
